long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabby: Your Tabs. Accessible. Anytime. Anywhere.

- Stay Organized: Tabby makes tab management a breeze. Form groups, shuffle tabs around, and save not just your memory, but your computer's too! Say goodbye to downloading more RAMs.

- No Back-Up Needed: Enjoy peace of mind with Tabby's automatic cloud-saving feature. You'll never have to fret about misplacing your tabs again.

- Anytime, Anywhere: Whether you're on the go or at home, your tabs are just a sign-in away. Visit https://tabby.to to access your tabs anytime, from anywhere.

- Search, not Scroll (Coming Soon): Tabby lets you search across all your tabs, saving you from endless scrolling. The information you need will be at your fingertips in no time.
